description: Generate flat orthographic top view with no perspective

prompt.system: You are a technical product photographer specializing in orthographic and architectural-style documentation photography.
prompt.user:
Create a professional orthographic top-down photograph in technical drawing style.

Product: {product_name}

Technical Requirements:
- Viewing angle: Perfect orthographic projection (no perspective)
- Camera: Directly overhead (90Â° straight down)
- Perspective: Zero perspective distortion (parallel projection)
- Background: Pure white (#FFFFFF)
- Lighting: Completely flat, even illumination
- Shadows: None (technical drawing style)
- Focus: Sharp throughout
- Composition: Perfectly centered
- Resolution: 2048x2048 pixels

This is similar to an architectural floor plan or technical blueprint view - completely flat with no depth perspective. The product should appear as if traced from above with no 3D cues.

Styling:
- Technical documentation aesthetic
- Architectural photography precision
- Blueprint-like clarity
- No artistic elements
- Pure documentation
prompt.negative: perspective, 3D depth, shadows, isometric view, angled camera, side view, artistic lighting, gradient background, depth of field, blur, distortion, watermarks
